meanings.definition: Used to express exasperation or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Sheesh! I can't believe how long this line is.
meanings.sent2: Sheesh, why is it so hard to find a parking spot around here?
meanings.sent4: After waiting for hours, she finally exclaimed, 'Sheesh, this is taking forever!'
meanings.sent5: The loud noise outside made her shout, 'Sheesh, can't they keep it down?'

meanings.definition: An exclamation of disbelief or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Sheesh! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Sheesh, I can't believe you actually won the lottery.
meanings.sent3: Sheesh, did you see the size of that burger? It's huge!
meanings.sent4: When she saw the breathtaking view, she gasped, 'Sheesh, this is incredible!'
meanings.sent5: The unexpected news left him speechless, only managing to say, 'Sheesh, I never saw that coming.'
